title: Film-Noir | The Amazing Mr. X (1948) Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari, Cathy O'Donnell | Movie

sources.title: Film-Noir | The Amazing Mr. X (1948) Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari, Cathy O'Donnell | Movie
sources.description:
In his eyes, the threat of terror! In his hands, the power to destroy!
A mysterious mystic named Alexis, makes a comfortable living by fleecing the gullible wealthy, Alexis' latest target is grieving young widow Christine Faber. Hoping to communicate with her husband, who supposedly died in a car crash two years earlier.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/HdOnXEYMyjY


Original title: The Amazing Mr. X (1948) AKA: The Spiritualist
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Bernard Vorhaus
Writers: Crane Wilbur, Muriel Roy Bolton 
Stars: Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari, Cathy O'Donnell
Genre: Classic Film, Film-Noir, Horror, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)

13:11 A very practical man
